name: David Jarrett
text: So here's the deal with Howie's. Large stuffed crust pepperoni, light sauce, add mushrooms and onions, with extra garlic herb crust. Toss in a order of 3 cheese bread, extra garlic herb, extra butter and extra parmesan. The whole family …More

name: Lori Hervey
text: The tastiest, stuffed full of yummy deliciousness, oven-baked subs around. The chicken bacon ranch is my favorite, followed by the fresh veggie packed turkey club sub. We got large sized, which left me with leftovers. The delivery is fast and friendly as well.

name: Gerard Stevenson
text: Ordered 2 pizzas for delivery. 2 large pizzas thin crust veggie and one a regular crust veggie pizza. Should have asked the total before ordering, was advised later these are considered “specialty pizzas” with a $5.00 tip, the total was $49.00, for two pizzas. You’ve lost a customer for life, for certain.

name: Steven Diadiun
text: Fast delivery and they don't cheap on the amount of toppings. Pleased

name: John Rooney
text: Made an online order and had to change it, called them up and they got it changed and done fast. Thanks guys!

name: Luke MacDonald
text: who tf leaves a bad review because of Americans being involved with a local church. You can bet the pizza is top notch here.

name: alexandria ledgerwood
text: I have been a Hungry Howies customer for over 20 years and for the first time in those 20+years I am hugely disappointed. I went to the Milford location and was greeted by an advertisement for the dance project at Highland United methodist …More

name: John Nykiel
text: I love this location! We had our son's birthday party and preordered 9 pizzas for right when they open. Not only were the pizzas ready, but the staff was amazing! They were nice and placed everything in my vehicle for me. Also, the pies were delicious! They are doing it right and are a welcomed addition to Milford.

name: Mike Pagenkopf
text: staff is grate   salads awesome   order is on time

name: Thomas Powell
text: Darcy provides great customer service. She's got a great career ahead in customer relations.

name: Wanda Marshall
text: Great place to eat, staff is outstanding!

name: Mike Peterson
text: Fabulous Grand Opening, Great Service and Great Food.

name: Brittani Holmes
text: Absolutely love this hungry howies I put the wrong thing on my online order and they remade it for me talk about amazing customer service!

name: Mike DeWitt
text: great staff always friendly. Food was outstanding.

name: Carli Hemele
text: The lettuce was brown and disgusting on my calzone. However service was fast and friendly.

name: Nita Gordon
text: Whoever made my pizza deserves a raise! I order a gluten free pizza with no cheese because of my dairy allergy, and I don’t even need to put my dairy free cheese on it at home. Wow! No one has ever made the time to make my cheese-less pizza with so much flavor and appetizing appearance. Yum! Thank you very much!
